name: worksleepplay
description: Work Sleep Play is a web app that allows the user to login in and select whether to work (productivity tracker), sleep (relaxing music/sounds and images to fall asleep to), or play (simple interactive games). The user will also be able to view their profile and see insights on how theyâ€™ve spent their time.
author: Amber Swartz, Maranda Zwieschowski, Nadine Delaire, Selma Elgabalawy
